name: Pip and the Dark forest
description:
We had an idea going on our head for the last 4 months, but we never decided what kind of graphics or gameplay we wanted with total security. Then we saw this jam and we totally wanted to give it a try with a classic style and platforms to give life to a small part of all the ideas we brought.

We hope you enjoy playing this game, we had a lot of fun on the process and it was a great opportunity to start shaping what we've been wanting to do for some time.

 

The team

 

Direction and conceptual art - Orionis

Composer - Spiral

Pixel Artist - Azuri

Programmer - Rainbits

 

Thanks to everyone who gave our game a chance!
